defi_sdk_py.address_const package

Module contents

class defi_sdk_py.address_const.AddressConst(config_data)[source]

Bases: object

This class initializes address constants from a provided configuration dictionary. It allows retrieval of various blockchain-related addresses.

return_str

A dictionary representation of all addresses.

Type:

dict

Parameters:

config_data (dict) – A dictionary containing configuration data with keys like ‘token’, ‘pool’, and other blockchain-related addresses.
